# The `CounterMappingContext` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

A <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/coverage/counter">Counter</a> mapping context is used to connect the counters, expressions and the obtained counter values. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}
